Text: High Quality, an actual DvD-Rip without the Nickelodeon  logo. Thumbs up, great Upload.

Download THIS torrent. Excellent A/V fidelity. The uploader clearly knew their stuff.

The series itself is highly recommended. One of the few western animation series actually worth watching, IMO.
thanks for this. great torrent .great quality. seeding is sharing

These files are from ZangetsuZero (Z-Z) on Demonoid.  While he gets poo-pooed a bit in the fansubbing world, what I\'ve seen of his have been much better than the crap non-fansubbers tend to put out.nnJust FYI.

I'd like to point out that episodes 53-55 don't have actually have the commentary track in them. I have no clue if they're actually there on the DVD or not, but they're not in the files. They just have a second copy of the normal audio track.
